'''Evelyn Katz''' is the judge who handled [[Pete Wilder|Pete's]] murder hearing.

==History==
At Pete's bail hearing, Evelyn noted that Pete didn't look sorry at all. When Pete confirmed it, she denied him bail.

==Career==
She is a judge.

==Notes and Trivia==
*She was credited as Judge.
